name: Glorious Sunrise
oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
• Target land gains "{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}" until end of turn.
• Draw a card if you control a creature with power 3 or greater.
• You gain 3 life.

name: "Voltaic Visionary" // "Voltaic Villain"
type_line: Creature — Human Wizard // Creature — Human Berserker

card_faces.name: "Voltaic Visionary"
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: "Voltaic Visionary" deals 2 damage to you. Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever you play a card exiled with "Voltaic Visionary", transform it.

name: Henrika Domnathi // Henrika, Infernal Seer
type_line: Legendary Creature — Vampire // Legendary Creature — Vampire

card_faces.name: Henrika Domnathi
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Each player sacrifices a creature.
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Transform Henrika Domnathi.

card_faces.name: Henrika, Infernal Seer
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
{1}{B}{B}: Each creature you control with flying, deathtouch, and/or lifelink gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: Nothing can be more dreadful than those awful women, who were—who are—waiting to suck my blood.

name: Boarded Window
oracle_text:
Creatures attacking you get -1/-0.
At the beginning of each end step, if you were dealt 4 or more damage this turn, exile Boarded Window.

name: Ancient Lumberknot
oracle_text: Each creature you control with toughness greater than its power assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

card_faces.name: Weaver of Blossoms
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

card_faces.name: Blossom-Clad Werewolf
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . does not always mean living in peace.

name: Mulch
oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

name: Honeymoon Hearse
oracle_text:
Trample
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Honeymoon Hearse becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor_text: A carriage crafted from the finest materials. Horses bred from the finest stock. Skuklls taken from the finest foes.

name: Bloodvial Purveyor
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player creates a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever Bloodvial Purveyor attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Blood token defending player controls.

name: Thirst for Discovery
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a basic land card.
flavor_text:
"This is your only warning, alchemist. The secrets of the sea are not yours to behold. Lord Krothuss will not be so merciful next time."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Headless Rider
oracle_text: Wheenver Headless Rider or another nontoken Zombie you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Headless Rider
oracle_text: Wheenver Headless Rider or another nontoken Zombie you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: He wanders the Moorlands hoping to one day chop off a head worthy of replacing his own.
